entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TestCurrentValueDoesNotAllocateOnceValueIsCached test failing in CI #84551
  • Older versions of nuget packages for Blazor Webassembly hosted project #84549
  • [API Proposal]: AsyncReaderWriterLock #84547
  • Access violation occurring during JIT compilation of Vector2 constructor #84546
  • Regression in handling of `UseDefaultCredentials` by `HttpClientHandler` in .NET Core #84545
  • Optimize new Vector3 { X=,Y=,Z=} pattern #84543
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: System.Memory's Encoding.GetChars with consumed bytes #84541
  • VariableLengthIntegerHelper returns incorrect value on consumed parameter #84540
  • DependencyGraphViewer: VS experimental designer fails for editing NodeForm #84538
  • GeneratedRegexAttribute pattern explanation seems wrong #84537
  • SPMI replay failure for Arm64 VectorTableLookup #84536
  • AVX512: Fold some bitwise operations to vpternlogq #84534
    Future

Closed

  • Address the TimeProvider community feedback #84274
    8.0.0
  • API to provide the current system time #36617
    8.0.0
  • Can't apply a [JsonConstructor] attribute on a record class with more than one constructor #84544
  • string.Format Works incorrectly or Inconsistently .net Framework vs .netCore vs Learn Article #84533

PullRequests

Created

  • The ConstructorBuilder and MethodBuilder generated parameter should not has default value by default #84550
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Fix minor jitdisasm issue #84548
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • DependencyGraphViewer: Feature add same window navigation for NodeForm #84542
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • DependencyGraphViewer: Fix catastrophic designer fail for NodeForm #84539
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Apply the TimeProvider design feedback #84501
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Enable AVX-512 in Memmove unrolling #84348
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • fix Kernel32.GetSystemTimes usage on Windows #84526
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • JIT: scalable profile counter mode #84427
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure loops respect dominators #84458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify target to enable config binding src generator from NuGet package, ensure it runs for all TFMs, and rename enabling property #84379
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Fix IUtf8SpanFormattable.TryFormat argument name #84535
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, TimeOnly, TimeSpan, Char, Rune #84469
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Updating the JIT to support Narrow, WidenLower, and WidenUpper for Vector512 #84498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Avx512 arithmetic #84429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512

Updated

  • Improve SequenceEqual for constant lengths unrolling #84524
    area-System.Memory
  • [JIT] X64 - Added containment support for `shlx`, `sarx`, `shrx` #84453
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-vm and other directories in coreclr #82381
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-pal and coreclr-debug directories #82380
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Vectorize IEnumerable<T>.Sum where possible #84519
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Use cinc instead of csel when possible #82031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `gtGetStructHandle` and friends #84212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use `gtNewIndir` in more places #84528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix some issues with null check handling #84523
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Add support to inline the field access of primitive types marked with TLS #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add PipeOptions.FirstPipeInstance enum value #83936
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on IPAddress and IPNetwork #84487
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Adding support for Vector512 `Equals`, `EqualsAny`, `op_Equality`, and `op_Inequality`. #83470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Initial work to enable native events in EventPipe #84318
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Update CodeAnalysis.src.globalconfig #84059
    area-Meta
  • Add message details for AmbiguousMatchException #84512
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Add SIMD to LowerCallMemcmp #84530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Split superpmi-diffs pipeline runs #84521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
